cab.content: This Document is the Property of balfour Britannic Malesty's government military Secret.1213 3 rom Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India, mil December 1919. (Tehran informed.) (Received 20th.) - 16862. Following from Malleson, 16th December : " Merv Agent reports, 9th December :- " 1. Persian Vice-Consul, Mehr AH, dismissed by order from Meshed. " 2. Bolshevik garrison of Merv still numbers 50 Armenians only. " 3. Afghans still interfering with Bolshevik orders and instructing Turkomanvillagers to withhold all help from Bolsheviks. . " 4. Afghans state whole of area, Kushk to Merv, ceded to them."
